name: Kiraya
description: Kiraya likes to shatter doubts with her fists. With great combat prowess and an unbendable will, people submit themselves to her, sometimes even with a hint of trust, as if she will protect them from all evil.

passiveSkill.name: Lionheart
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Kiraya appears, she grants a {placeholder} HP Shield, and enemy's Rage Restore decreases by {placeholder}, lasts 10 seconds.Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Deploy at least 5 Light or Healing class partners.Activation Reward: Recovery Rate of all Ally partners increases by 50%."}

uniqueSkill.name: Lionheart Frenzy
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "A majestic Lionheart strike. Kiraya attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Grants a shield equal to {placeholder} of the caster's HP to allies in the same column."}

specialSkill.name: Fury
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Stabs a claymore into the earth. Kiraya attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, gaining a shield that equals {placeholder} of her HP.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Upper Slash
normalSkill.description: Kiraya swings her claymore upward. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: A majestic Lionheart strike. Kiraya attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Grants a shield equal to {placeholder} of the caster's HP to allies in the same column.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Kiraya appears, she grants a {placeholder} HP Shield, and enemy's Rage Restore decreases by {placeholder}, lasts 10 seconds.Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Deploy at least 5 Light or Healing class partners.Activation Reward: Recovery Rate of all Ally partners increases by 50%.
templateData.lens6.skill: Stabs a claymore into the earth. Kiraya attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, gaining a shield that equals {placeholder} of her HP.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
